name: Holding Together the Unraveling Cord (Free Prototype)
name_original: Holding Together the Unraveling Cord (Free Prototype)
description:
Mike is a family man, but he and his wife have been fighting. Will he reconcile with her, or will he end up leaving the earth, and living within a computer? Both are possibilities in "Holding Together the Unraveling Cord"

This game currently has 18 endings, and I am continually working on more. This is a prototype of the game, a trial run. Hopefully, if people like this game and its style, I can expand it (adding visual effects as well as sound will be one of the first things)

Please try it, since it's free. I'm pretty sure it's free of any bugs, but just in case, please report all the bugs to Trekade@outlook.com Thanks, I hope you enjoy the game.
